titleStmt.title: Poems: vvritten by Wil. Shake-speare. Gent
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Tho. Cotes, and are to be sold by Iohn Benson, dwelling in St. Dunstans Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Contains all but eight of the sonnets, "A lover's complaint", "The passionate pilgrim" (mostly not by Shakespeare), "The phoenix and the turtle" (attributed to Shakespeare), and poems of miscellaneous authors.
The plate contains eight lines of verse and is signed "W.M. sculpsit.", i.e. William Marshall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
